DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the feasibility of FLT-PET to improve the diagnosis of relapse in patients with irradiated lung cancer in comparison with FDG-PET/CT.
DOC.brief_title: FLT-PET for Early Detection of Relapse in Patients With Irradiated Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: history with lung cancer, small cell or nonsmall cell radiotherapy of lung cancer ended within the last 24 months radiotherapy might be normofractionated or stereotactic current suspicion of relapse written and oral consent communication difficulties pregnancy or lactation
